description.overview: Mind represents your cognitive sharpness, ability to concentrate, and ease of expressing yourself.
description.detailed: This group combines three mental functions: Mental Clarity (how clearly you think), Focus (your ability to concentrate), and Communication (how easily you express ideas). Together they show whether your mind is sharp and flowing or foggy and scattered. High scores mean you're thinking clearly, staying focused, and communicating effectively. Low scores suggest mental fog, distractions, or difficulty finding words.

quiet.challenging: Rest your mind - this is recovery time
quiet.mixed: Mental activity is subtle - honor the quiet
quiet.harmonious: Your mind is peacefully still - enjoy the calm

mild.challenging: Mental fog is lifting - be patient with yourself
mild.mixed: Thoughts are gentle but present - notice them
mild.harmonious: Mental energy flows easily - trust your thinking

moderate.challenging: Mental obstacles exist but you're working through them
moderate.mixed: Your mind is active in multiple directions
moderate.harmonious: Mental clarity is strong and steady - use it

high.challenging: Mental intensity is high - manage cognitive load
high.mixed: Your mind is racing but creative - channel it
high.harmonious: Peak mental performance - tackle complex tasks

extreme.challenging: Mental overload is real - simplify where possible
extreme.mixed: Mental energy is maximum - wild but potentially brilliant
extreme.harmonious: Your mind is exceptionally sharp - big decisions favored
